attributes.action: Increase the tax free mileage allowance from 40p per mile to correlate with rising fuel costs
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Due to the increase in fuel being a constant in 2008, the 40p tax free allowance for business mileage does not cover the cost of the fuel used let alone a proportion of the tax, insurance and repairs costs. Therefore I would like to see the tax free allowance be brought more in line with today's economic climate.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
